page.title: 20NEWSPAPER ITEMS - JULY 1985
page.content:
Royalty at Bognor. {The Prince and Princess of Wales}could be visiting Aldwick in the summer of 1985 to see Earl Spencer who owns three properties in the area. The earl would like his grandchildren to come, as they haven't yet visited him at Bognor. They may be coming for a break before heading to Balmoral. The earl's houses are near the site of Craigweil House where George V stayed.
Derek Bell Derek Bell, who lives in Pagham, is entering this year's{Le Mans}race with John Watson. Bell, at the age of 45, is in the Rothmans-Porsche team. It has been one Le Mans to another, as his name was in the credits of the film of this famous 24 hour race with that of the star Steve McQueen.
